metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6493 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in WebAuthentication in Google Chrome prior to 83.0.4103.97allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
